<<<<<<< HEAD
The Kings entertainment by the city of London. Sol radiis orbem illuminat, Rex Urbem. Wiseman, Samuel.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for Rowland Reynolds, at the Sun and Bible in the Poultry, London, : 1671.
Signed: S. Wiseman. "With allowance." Verse: "My Muse, whose modesty still dis-allow'd". Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
